articles.description: There is a question mark over Rabada's availability too; SA have options in Ngidi, Nortje, Jansen, Stuurman and Sipamla to choose from

articles.title: West Indies seek quick remedies as World Cup looms | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: West Indies have just two more T20Is - against Australia - after Monday's game in the build up to the T20 World Cup
articles.content:
